# index(after:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the position immediately after the given index. (See `Collection.index`.)

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func index(after i: Int) -> Int
```

## Manipulating indices

- **startIndex**: The position of the first element in a nonempty collection. (See `Collection.startIndex`.)
- **endIndex**: TThe collection’s “past the end” position—that is, the position one greater than the last valid subscript argument. (See `Collection.endIndex`.)
